name: Robar

skills.name: Stunning Strength
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Grants an Extra Turn if this debuff is successfully placed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Wild Swing
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Merciless Assault
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Damage increases if the target is under [Sleep], [Stun] or [Freeze] debuffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
